In this digital age, do you think modern inventions have made our lives simpler, or more complex and dangerous? Discuss with examples…

In my view this digital age and modern inventions are neither dangerous nor simpler it depends on the usage of the technology.

 For example Einstein invented dynamite to break the hills and construct roads, bridges, dams etc. But some members used this formula and invented nuclear missiles and warheads for destruction. 

Like this there are many examples like 'internet' it is also depends on way of using it.

Many will use internet in many useful ways like:-

1)To develop business by doing research and develop themselves and sustain in the market and it also useful in many ways in the business.in every department internet is useful in their daily activities.

2) Internet is also useful in many ways to the mankind it is useful in education, research, social networking, business development etc.

 Some members use the internet in wrong way for example 'Hacking'. it is moist dangerous thing in present day scenario. With the help of hacking, the hackers will hack others system and corrupt their system by sending virus files into others systems with out their knowledge and also with the help of hacking they can steal the confidential information with their knowledge

By the above example regarding the usage of internet we can say the modern inventions are neither made our lives simple, nor complex and dangerous it depends on the usage of technology.

We can take the social networking sites as an example for our study. Social networking sites are also invented to develop the relationships of people, but some people use this social networking sites in a wrong way for example their is many evidences regarding this issue that had seen in televisions and also studied in news papers  that trapping persons who is unknown to and using them in many ways and also in some cases it leads to suicides also.

      By the above example we can say that the technology invention is mainly based on the usage of it.

We cannot say that technology development is not only dangerous for our lives it also made our lives simple and easy.

In my opinion we can discuss this present topic in some ways that are useful to the mankind.

1)Socio cultural:- Technology plays an important role in developing the socio culture of the people.

    For example:-With the development of technology in every aspect of humankind like communication facility, transport facility the socio culture of the people also developed

2) Economical: With the help of technology development the economy of a country also develops.

     For example with the technology development only 'Globalisation' takes place it means any company can launch their business in any where in the world. This leads to the economic development of the country.

3)Political:- Technology also plays an important role in the area of political also. Politics plays an important role in developing a country.

    For example: With the help of technology only the present youth and young stars are enrolling their names in the voters list and using their "Right To Vote" right and electing a good leader for the country.

Conclusion:- I conclude that the modern inventions are useful to the society and also dangerous. It mainly depends on the way of using it.
